Hello, random fan.

(ಠ_ಠ)...is the thread now dead btw? Any other skin ideas?
I loved Darksiders and Darksiders II.Played the shit out of them on all difficulties! Beating the Crucible.
Yes. The people allowed it to die, and I am not one to keep beating a dead horse.
Well, im sure Sion will get a new skin soon. Maybe it's as awesome as your idea and hopefully not 750 RP Tier.
